name: Peter V. PAGANO, Appellant, v. The PENNSYLVANIA STATE HORSE RACING COMMISSION, et al.
name_abbreviation: Pagano v. Pennsylvania State Horse Racing Commission

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: Peter V. PAGANO, Appellant, v. The PENNSYLVANIA STATE HORSE RACING COMMISSION, et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed. 50 Pa.Cmwlth. 499, 413 A.2d 44.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Michael D. Fishbein, Arnold Levin, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Mary Ellen Krober, Deputy Atty. Gen., Debra K. Wallet, Camp Hill, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
452 A.2d 1015
Peter V. PAGANO, Appellant, v. The PENNSYLVANIA STATE HORSE RACING COMMISSION, et al.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 18, 1982.
Decided Dec. 10, 1982.
Michael D. Fishbein, Arnold Levin, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Mary Ellen Krober, Deputy Atty. Gen., Debra K. Wallet, Camp Hill, for appellees.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
